Work

At Datart Lab, we design and build intelligent optimization engines from the ground up — starting with mathematical models and algorithms and extending all the way to robust software systems and user-friendly applications. We combine rigorous research with real-world impact. By leading government-funded projects and contributing to state-of-the-art academic work, we ensure our methods remain innovative, validated, and impactful. At the same time, we partner with companies in logistics, transportation, healthcare, and beyond to turn complex challenges into practical, scalable solutions.

Selected Projects

Manufacturing | Industry 4.0 | Optimization

Single Runway Dual Overhead Crane Scheduling Engine

Mining | Engine | Routing

Revenue Management | Engine | Scheduling

Publications

  • C. Y. Yildiz and O. E. Kundakcioglu. Disaster relief inventory simulation: Managing resources in humanitarian camps. Proceedings of the 2024 INFORMS Winter Simulation Conference.

  • I. E. Sakarya and O. E. Kundakcioglu. Multi-instance learning by maximizing the area under receiver operating characteristic curve. Journal of Global Optimization, 2023, vol. 85, pp. 351-375.
  • C. D. C. Bozkir, O. E. Kundakcioglu, and A. C. Henry. Hospital service levels during drug shortages: Stocking and transshipment policies for pharmaceutical inventory. Journal of Global Optimization, 2022, vol. 83, pp. 565-584.
  • S. Korkmaz, O. E. Kundakcioglu, and O. Sivrikaya. A fluid approximation for the single-leg fare allocation problem with nonhomogeneous Poisson demand. Journal of Revenue and Pricing Management, 2022, vol. 21, pp. 81-96.
  • O. Simsek and O. E. Kundakcioglu. Cost of fairness in agent scheduling for contact centers. Journal of Industrial and Management Optimization, 2022, vol. 18, no. 2, pp. 873-896.

  • S. Gozuyilmaz and O. E. Kundakcioglu. Mathematical optimization for time series decomposition. OR Spectrum, 2021, vol. 43, pp. 733-758.
  • M. Önal, O. E. Kundakcioglu, and S. Jain. An EOQ model with deteriorating items and self-selection constraints. Optimization Letters, 2020, vol. 14, pp. 1491-1518.
  • T. Yavuz, O. E. Kundakcioglu, and T. Ünlüyurt. Exact and heuristic approaches to detect failures in failed k-out-of-n systems. Computers and Operations Research, 2019, vol. 112, 104752.
  • N. R. Barshes, S. Saedi, J. Wrobel, P. Kougias, O. E. Kundakcioglu, and D. G. Armstrong. A model to estimate cost-savings in diabetic foot ulcer prevention efforts. Journal of Diabetes and Its Complications, 2017, vol. 31, no. 4, pp. 700-707.
  • B. Balcik, C. D. C. Bozkir, and O. E. Kundakcioglu. A literature review on inventory management in humanitarian supply chains. Surveys in Operations Research and Management Science, 2016, vol. 21, no. 2, pp. 101-116.
  • M. Önal, A. Yenipazarli, and O. E. Kundakcioglu. A mathematical model for perishable products with price- and stock-dependent demand. Computers and Industrial Engineering, 2016, vol. 102, pp. 246-258.
  • S. Saedi, O. E. Kundakcioglu, and A. C. Henry. Mitigating the impact of drug shortages for a healthcare facility: An inventory management approach. European Journal of Operational Research, 2016, vol. 251, no. 1, pp. 107-123.
  • H. Yang, O. E. Kundakcioglu, and D. Zeng. Healthcare data analytics. Information Systems and e-Business Management, 2015, vol. 13, no. 4, pp. 595-597.
  • M. H. Poursaeidi and O. E. Kundakcioglu. Robust support vector machines for multiple instance classification. Annals of Operations Research, 2014, vol. 216, no. 1, pp. 205-227.
